name: graphql-js-client
description: Feature light client library for fetching resources via GraphQL
author: Shopify Inc.

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run setup-paths && concurrently 'npm run types-fixture:build' 'npm run watch' 'http-server -p 4200 .tmp/test' 'npm run -s print-start-message'
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec 'npm run test:build && cp test/index.html dist/tests.js .tmp/test' -w src/ -w test/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.test:build: cross-env BABEL_ENV='tdd' rollup -c .rollup-tests.js -f iife -i test/**/*.js > dist/tests.js
scripts.mocha: npm run types-fixture:build && cross-env BABEL_ENV='development' mocha --compilers js:babel-register -u tdd $(npm run -s mocha:reporter-args) test/**/*.js
scripts.print-start-message:
wait-on file:.tmp/test/index.html file:.tmp/test/tests.js tcp:4200 file:fixtures/types.js && echo "

⚡️⚡️⚡️  Good to go at http://localhost:4200 ⚡️⚡️⚡️"
scripts.types-fixture:refresh: npm run types-fixture:fetch-graphql-schema && npm run types-fixture:build
scripts.types-fixture:build: rimraf fixtures/types.js && npm run types-fixture:generate-graphql-types && npm run types-fixture:extract-type-bundle
